ComicInfo.Title: Beware the Bombardiers!
ComicInfo.Summary: Beware the Bombardiers!: The Bombardiers, a group that destroys buildings for owners who want to collect the insurance, are stopped by Thor.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:27:02. [Issue ID 35504]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Max Yadow,Dr. Lionel Jeffries,Detective Lieutenant Nathaniel Alexander Byrd [Blackbyrd],Nurse Morgan,Thor,The Bombardiers
